meanings.definition: Not expressing or revealing commitment or opinion
meanings.sent1: She gave a noncommittal response when asked about her favorite color.
meanings.sent2: His noncommittal attitude made it hard to know what he really thought.
meanings.sent3: The noncommittal cat refused to choose between the red and blue toy mice.
meanings.sent4: Her noncommittal smile left everyone wondering what she was thinking.
meanings.sent5: The noncommittal clouds hovered in the sky, neither raining nor clearing up.

meanings.definition: Refusing to take a definite position or to say yes or no
meanings.sent1: The politician remained noncommittal on the controversial issue.
meanings.sent2: Being noncommittal in negotiations can sometimes be strategic.
meanings.sent3: The noncommittal student avoided picking a side in the class debate.
meanings.sent4: His noncommittal stance was like standing in the middle of a seesaw.
meanings.sent5: The noncommittal wind blew in all directions, unable to make up its mind.
